title: Legal name
description: A name that identifies the person for legal, administrative and other official purposes. A person's legal name will usually be the one that is found on official government documents.

title: Translation of name
description: A translation of the person's individual name in a different language.

title: Former name
description: A name that the person has used in the past.

title: Alternative name
description: Another name that the person is known by. This might be an alias, a nickname or a name that the person is also known as (aka)

title: Birth name
description: "The legal name of the person at birth."
